prompt: Write a patient-friendly handout that explains why reducing salt is important for blood pressure. Use simple language, practical examples, and bullet points. Aim for a 6th-grade reading level.
Create a clear list of post-skin biopsy care instructions. Include wound care, signs of infection, pain management, and when to seek help. Make it easy to follow for patients.
Summarize key points about hypertension for patients. Include bullet points on symptoms, causes, lifestyle changes, medications, and red flags. Keep it concise, informative, and medically accurate.
